mosquitoR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

decimal_places()

Return the number of decimal places in a given value

get_senscape_data()

Download data from Senscape server using http get request.

invstd2()

Inverse double-standardize a variable

make_aggregated_time_series()

Make complete time series aggregated by a given interval. TODO: WE NEED TO MAKE THIS MORE GENERAL STILL

make_lonlat_from_samplingcell_ids()

Extract longitudes or latitudes from sampling cell IDs.

make_mask()

Mask a number by rounding it down to the nearest mask value. Used by 'make_sampling_cells' for transforming exact locations into masked sampling cells. This is basically the same as the round_down function but it returns a character instead of a numeric.

make_metadata_template()

Make metadata tempplate ready for data portal

make_samplingcell_ids()

Creates standard sampling cell IDs by masking a set of longitude and latitude values.

round_down()

Round a given number x downward to the nearest n.

std2()

Center and double-standardize a variable
